title: [EUW] European Scrim League

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hey! 

We (Organizers) are currently searching for **Free Agents** or **Teams** who would be interested in participating on our "**European Scrim League**".

You might ask yourself: "What the hell is a Scrim League?" And that is a good question.
Our Scrim League at least is a League for Teams and Players **between Silver V and Diamond V**.
The Rules & Tournament-structure are pretty similar to those the **European LCS** uses currently, the exact rules will soon also be published on our **Discord**.
We are planning on having a custom "transfer" system, which you dont have to use obviously, but it could add some more professional flavour.
The matches will regularly be played at 18:30 every saturday, if you wish to play your match on another date / time you'll have to talk to the captain of your opponents team and messsage me (_I dont have to be online I just have to know for planning purposes_).

**The official startdate is on 04.08.2018**

If you are interested you can either register as Free Agent or a Team of 5-7ppl by adding "LSG dubble" on League of Legends or joining our official discord via https://discord.gg/5B2tYKY

_Thanks for reading, looking forward to see you in Battle soon!_
